comment.author: 63493070@N02
comment._content: Wreck of the June Smith Plane (Aug 11 1925) Photos taken next morning. Men shown- left is man named Freddie, man on right is a man named Jack. Wreck is where the current Chester L. Washington Golf Course is today @ Western Ave. and 125th Ave, near Burdett Airport in L.A. Accident passengers were June Smith (pilot) Paul E. Richter (passenger).
